description: Irina Slavina earlier left a message blaming "the Russian Federation for my death".
title: Russian editor dies after setting herself on fire
title_page: Russian editor dies after setting herself on fire - BBC News
maintext: In the video, a man is seen running to a woman to help extinguish the flames. She repeatedly pushes him back as he tries to use his coat to stop the fire, before she eventually falls to the ground.
